price: A cikin zukãtansu akwai wata cũta. Sai Allah Ya ƙãramusu wata cũta, kuma suna da azãba mai raɗaɗi sabõda ãbin da suka kasance suna yi na ƙarya.
arabic: فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ فَزَادَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَرَضٗاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡذِبُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fī qulūbihim maraḍun fazādahumu al-lahu maraḍan walahum ʿadhābun alīmun bimā kānū yakdhibūna
